descriptionHtml:
Shinier Auriel\'s Bow

Description:
when i first got Auriel\'s Bow, Serena commented that \"it wasn\'t as shiny as she expected it to be\" and that\'s what i thought too, so i decided to make this quick and simple mod that increases the brightness of the texture and makes the environment mask texture shinier 

Installation:
just paste copy and paste and overwrite if asked

Uninstallation: 
delete the following items from your \"Data\\textures\\dlc01\\weapons\\auriel\" folder
- aurielsbow.dds
- aurielsbow_m.dds
- aurielsquiver.dds
or just delete the whole \"auriel\" folder

Requirements:
Dawnguard DLC

=== Check out these sites to find more of my mods and video demos ===
http://www.youtube.com/user/gh0strec0n141
http://ghostrecon123skyrimmods.blogspot.com/
author: ghostrecon123
